snippet: LEAD: The two government agents are suspicious. While prowling through this city's vast wholesale produce market, a known distribution point for contraband, they notice one cardboard box stacked among many because it appears to have been opened an...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The two government agents are suspicious. While prowling through this city's vast wholesale produce market, a known distribution point for contraband, they notice one cardboard box stacked among many because it appears to have been opened and later resealed.

headline.main: Los Angeles Journal; In Relentless Pursuit Of Avocado Rustlers

byline.original: By MICHAEL LEV, Special to The New York Times
